channel.title: Need help ASAP please! [Apple]
channel.description:
Hey guys!
Well, I've had this issue with my iPod for along time and the issue is my home button is jammed or something. Well, today I got on the support thing on Apple and I was going through all the shit they have you fill out. I got to this one page where it said "You might not be covered." and it gave me all these options: AppleCare, Pay per call or I think my issue is covered. My question is will I be charged if it isn't? I clicked continue and it brought up "Contact Option" page and it gives me: Call you now, schedule a call or I'll call later. So I don't know if this will charge me or not. So please help me! I would like to find out without being in risk of having to pay anything... Lol.
RuneWings317

item.title: Need help ASAP please! [Apple]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:4, topic:415554”]Won’t they notify you if it costs money?[/quote]That’s what I was thinking… But I don’t know, sometimes they pull shit on you.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help ASAP please! [Apple]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:415554”]Push the home button down hard and just mess with it. It’s already fucked up.
Call their number, you won’t get charged massively. You might not even get charged at all… Cheap fucker :3[/quote]I am ;D But I really still don’t feel like paying for it xD

Read full topic
